title: Required Step
intro: Required Steps are helpful in introducing constraints into a Template, and forcing users to answer a given question. This is particularly useful in explicitly requiring work to be done on a Template before the User can validate (store it's data in the Job and therefore on FieldLogs) a specific Step.

blocks.content: In the Template Editor, go ahead and open a new side panel from the top right hand corner.

blocks.caption:
To set a Step as Required, switch to the Step Information side panel by clicking on the icon. The are many addition pieces of Step-specific information that can be edited here but to mark a Step as Required we need to check the Required checkbox in the Step Options section.

This will mark the Step in the Template definition with a red asterisk

Required Steps on the web
A step is given shown a small red asterisk to indicate that the Step or Input is required an answer by the User.

Required Steps on mobile devices
A red informative banner appears if the User tries to validate the Step without providing an answer to the Input. On the map view here, for example, a user would not be able to process the next Step or Input unless the present one is answered.
